ForbiddenComment:ContactRepository.kt$ContactRepository$* List customers - contacts with outgoing invoices. * TODO: Implement proper derived role filtering with JOIN to InvoicesTable * For now, returns all active contacts (caller should filter by derived roles) * CRITICAL: MUST filter by tenant_id
